header_text: You are on a walk with your dog, trying to relax and exercise. You find yourself on an unusual route and don't recognize your surroundings. You take out your cell phone and reroute home, showing that you are able to adapt.

elements.Text: Are you able to find your way home?

elements.name: You are on a walk with your dog, trying to relax and exercise. You find yourself on an unusual route and don't recognize your surroundings. You take out your cell phone and reroute home, showing that you are able to adapt._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
